The survey found that training on national recommendations on nutrition during pregnancy was provided in 26 
countries (49%) (Fig. 7.6). This training is performed as: in-service training in six countries (11%), and both  
pre- and in-service training in 19 countries (36%). Five Member States reported not providing any training for 
health care professionals and a further 23
